# How To Docs

## Authentication for Azure-hosted apps and services

- [Auth to Azure OpenAI from an Azure-hosted app](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/ai/how-to/app-service-aoai-auth.md): Learn how to authenticate your Azure hosted .NET app to an Azure OpenAI resource using Microsoft Entra ID.

## Call functions

- [Access data in AI functions](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/ai/how-to/access-data-in-functions.md): Learn how to pass data to AIFunction objects and how to access the data within the function delegate.

## Security and content safety

- [Work with content filtering](https://raw.githubusercontent.com/dotnet/docs/refs/heads/main/docs/ai/how-to/content-filtering.md): Learn how to manage OpenAI content filtering programmatically in a .NET app using the OpenAI client library.
